name: Quarantine or The Self Isolation of the Mind
name_original: Quarantine or The Self Isolation of the Mind
description:
In this small prototype, I am showcasing the early form idea for a new psychological horror thriller made with RPGMakerMV. This is the earliest playable draft introducing the concept and some ideas that I would like to put forward. If you have any feedback I would love to hear from you. 

Thank you for taking the time to look at my little project.

TheBlackGriffin
